column1: I opened my eyes last night and saw you in the low light
column2: 昨夜我睁开眼，看见你在昏暗的灯光下
column6: 沿着海湾走下去，在岸边
column7: Staring up at the stars that aren't there anymore
column9: I was feeling the night grow old and you were looking so cold
column10: 我感觉着夜的逝去，而你看起来如此的冷漠
column13: 所以犹如一个内向者，我把我的衬衫披在我的肩上
column14: Around my arms and began to shiver violently before
column18: You happened to look and see the tunnels all around me
column19: 你无意间发现围绕在我四周的隧道
column22: All the subways around create a great sound
column23: 四周的地道汇聚出震耳欲聋的声音
column25: 对我疲惫的身心说：永别了
column26: With your ear to a seashell
column28: You can hear the waves in underwater caves
column29: 你会听见来自水下洞穴的海浪声
column30: As if you actually were inside a saltwater room
column31: 仿佛你真的置身于深海空间
column34: Time together is just never quite enough
column35: 在一起的时间总是不够
column36: When you and I are alone
column37: I've never felt so at home
column38: 当你和我都独自一人时 我从来没有如此自在
column39: What will it take to make or break this hint of love?
column40: 制造或打破这爱情线索的代价是什么
column46: Can you believe that the crew has gone?
column47: 你相信那些船员已经远去吗？
column48: And they wouldn't let me sign on
column50: All my islands have sunk in the deep
column52: 我所有的岛屿都已坠入深渊
column53: And I can hardly relax or even oversleep
column54: 我根本无处休息更别说睡过头了
column55: When I feel warm with your hand in mine
column56: 我能感受到你手心的温暖
column57: When we walk along the shoreline
column58: 当我与你牵手漫步在海岸的时候
column59: I guess we'll never know why sparrows love the snow
column60: 我猜，我永远不会知道麻雀爱雪的理由
column61: We'll turn out all of the lights and set this ballroom aglow
column62: 我们将关上所有灯，把这舞厅布置得一片通红
column66: do you wish we'd fall in love?

column78: 在一起的时间总是不够
column79: When you and I are alone

column88: When we're apart what ever are you thinking of?
column89: 当我们分离时，无论你在想什么
column90: If this is what I call home
column91: why does it feel so alone?
column92: 如果这就是我所谓的“家”，它为何又感觉这么孤独？
column94: do you wish we'd fall in love?
